Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by New York (N) in 1980...
Injured on 5/21/1980 with a Tight Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/12/1982 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 5/29/1984 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from New York (N) to Los Angeles on 1/31/1985 (Going to LA: RF D. Strawberry. Going to NYM: C G. Carter, CF K. Yamamoto, 2B J. Ray)...
Injured on 4/7/1985 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/1/1987, off Randy Jones (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/20/1987, off Greg Maddux (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1989, hitting .625 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1990, hitting .579 with 0 HR, 3 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 9/17/1991...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1991, hitting .560 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1991, hitting .421 with 8 HR, 24 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1992, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
